title: The World Is Overflowing with Monster, I’m Taking a Liking to This Life - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mature   Psychological   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manga   Anti-social Protagonist   Apocalypse   Assassins   Average-looking Protagonist   Beast Companions   Cheats   Cowardly Protagonist   Delinquents   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Firearms   Game Elements   Goblins   Gore   Gunfighters   Hikikomori   Hunters   Late Romance   Level System   Magic Beasts   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Neet   Ninjas   Orcs   Post-apocalyptic   R-15   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Survival   Weak to Strong
author: Yosshaa!   よっしゃあっ！
description: On his way home from his office, the main protagonist drove and ran over a big dog. At that moment, he heard the sudden sound of a voice inside his head. ≪The monster has been subjugated, gaining experience points.≫ 「Eh?」 Before anyone knew, the world has changed. Monsters appear, this is a game-like world where levels, skills, and status exist. This is an adventure where the modern world becomes fantasy and where the main protagonist has to strive hard for his survival.>
